name: The Nothing
description: The Nothing is a surreal and atmospheric action game with a new aesthetic, procedurally generated elements and perma-death - Designed for multiple short "runs", with endings based on the route you've chosen and the actions you've taken.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q8400 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 @ 3.00GHz or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard
